summary:
A gold dagger, sword and greatsword.
New meshes
descriptionHtml:
This is my first weapon mod.
I made it because I wanted a smaller/shorter sized greatsword for my female character and I also wanted a golden texture that matched my golden armor.

- Weapons come in dagger, longsword and greatsword forms.
- Upgrade-able and create-able at any smiths (Ebony armor perk required to create).
- Statistically equivalent to ebony weapons. Solid but not overpowered stats, IMO.
- A free set can be found on the second floor of Warmaidens, above the counter (Whiterun blacksmith).
- All have a cover/scabbard.
- All have blood maps for combat.
- To install, just merge the Data file of this mod, with your Skyrim Data file.


My armor modes...(all nsfw)

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35119
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34775
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33944
author: cyric79
